guidanceItem.title: Debug compiles are turned off.
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that debug compiles are turned off in the machine.config file on production servers.


How to Fix

You can control whether or not the compiler produces debug builds that include debug symbols by using the <compilation> element. To turn off debug compiles, set debug="false" as shown below:

<compilation debug="false" explicit="true" defaultLanguage="vb" />

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
